definition: opera (or role) involving much singing and action/(fig.) highlight/main feature/major activity
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Using a gun is one of the students' specialities.
sentences.chinese: 用槍，是警官學校特殊的重頭戲之一。

sentences.english: The launch of the iPad was the highlight - another groundbreaking consumer Internet device that re-defined a market!
sentences.chinese: iPad是蘋果的重頭戲，重新定義了一個市場。

sentences.english: Our main attraction tonight is lady mud wrestling.
sentences.chinese: 我們今晚的重頭戲是女子泥漿摔跤。

sentences.english: For some guys, the annual fishing trip is the highlight of their calendar.
sentences.chinese: 有些人把每年的釣魚之旅視爲是行事曆上的重頭戲。

sentences.english: Oh, not the main act, but the guy who comes on first is a crack-up.
sentences.chinese: 哦，重頭戲一般，但是第一個出場的傢伙挺逗。

sentences.english: The script itself may be an overwhelming task, but one of the first stepping stones is actually beginning the script.
sentences.chinese: 劇本是壓倒一切的重頭戲，但是千里之行，始於足下。

definition: large-scale Chinese opera/Beijing opera/major dramatic production (movie, TV series etc)
the curtain falls/lower the curtain/to come to an end (of a meeting)
to go on stage/fig. to appear on the scene/used in advertising to mean new product
meeting place/place where people gather/CL:個|个[ge4]
carnival during the Lantern Festival, with lantern displays and traditional folk performances such as stilt walking and lion dance
to beat the gong to open a performance
to start sth new or original (idiom); to break a new path/to break fresh ground
axis/principal axis (in mechanics, optics, botany etc)/main axle (of engine)
